name: .KART
summary: Learn about .KART files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open KART files with SRB2Kart in Windows and macOS. To open a KART file with the game, place it in the appropriate SRB2Kart directory and load it using the in-game add-on menu or console commands.

The Sonic Robo Blast 2 and Kart Krew Dr. Robotnik's Ring Racers games also support the KAT format. Finally, programs that support Doom WAD files can also open KART files, most notably SLADE, a Doom modding application.
